introductionContent.text: Welcome to the Demonstrations Session of NAACL HLT 2016 in San Diego.
The demonstrations session is an opportunity for researchers and developers to present their systems and programs related to natural language processing.
We were fortunate to receive 32 outstanding papers, of which we accepted 20.
These systems will be displayed during the poster session on Monday and Tuesday of the conference.
